intro: Psychotria sangiana, commonly known as the "Blue Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking blue-violet flowers, which are typically clustered in inflorescences. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria sangiana is also notable for its use in traditional medicine and its role in ecological systems.
